dimension: 5 3/4 x 9 1/2 x 6 1/4 in. (14.61 x 24.13 x 15.88 cm) (includes finial)
medium: Sheffield plate (silver fused to copper), wood
title: Teapot
description: teapot, round, decorated at top and around the middle with a band of strap mount work in leaf and grape design; the spout is joined to the body by a shell shape, and the cover and finial are decorated with radiated fluting; the finial is also gadrooned around the edge; wooden handle attached to body by wedge-shaped piece of silver
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Crosby in memory of Mrs. Albert W. Hastings
